15004098.Brief effect description: ATK 30%{passiveImg:up_g} after this unit collects ki spheres
15004098.Line description: ATK 30%{passiveImg:up_g} after this unit collects ki spheres with 5 or more STR Ki Spheres obtained and for 2 turns from the chraracter's entry turn or for 4 turns from the chraracter's entry turn or 29
15004098.Paragraph Title: When starting from the 2 turn from the character's entry turn or starting from the 4 turn from the character's entry turn or starting from the 6 turn from the character's entry turn

Button.Name: Is Ki at least 12 on this turn?

Slider.Name: How much ki is there on this turn?

Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 150%{passiveImg:up_g}
*On the 1st, 3rd & 5th turns from the character's entry turn*
- Changes Ki Spheres: STR to AGL
- Medium chance of evading enemy's attack
- DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g} per AGL Ki Sphere obtained (up to 150%)
*On the 2nd, 4th & 6th turns from the character's entry turn*
- Changes Ki Spheres: AGL to STR
- High chance of performing a critical hit
- ATK 30%{passiveImg:up_g} per STR Ki Sphere obtained (up to 150%)
*When attacking with 12 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g}

5444.superDescription:
Raises DEF for 1 turn, 
causes supreme damage to enemy 
and seals Super Attack
